title: Separating Terms
text: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following: $$\frac{24p^2}{\left(-3p\right)}-\frac{33p}{\left(-3p\right)}$$.
speech: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following:  fraction, 24 p squared, over, negative 3 p,  minus fraction, 33 p, over, negative 3 p,  .

title: Simplify Terms
text: What is the result once each fraction term is simplified?
